      • restore

        public abstract Filter restore​()
        Clears all configurations that have not been applied to the source file.
        Returns:
        Returns this Filter object, which can be used for subsequent setting operations.
        Since:
        4

      • applyToSource

        public abstract long applyToSource​(ImageSource source)
                            throws IOException
        Applies the configurations to the source file.

        This method requires the permission to modify the source file represented by the ImageSource object. The configurations do not take effect until this method is called.

        Parameters:
        source - Indicates the image source file to which the configurations will be applied.
        Returns:
        Returns the size (in bytes) of the image file edited based on the configurations if the operation is successful; returns -1 otherwise.
        Throws:
        IOException - Throws this exception if the modification permission has not been obtained.
        Since:
        4
